title: Down to Earth: An Astronomy Education Programme for the UK
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This is a public engagement project so the 'findings/outcomes were used as given in the project objectives. Education,Other Cultural
findingsText: This is a public engagement project. By sharing the methodology (already presented at science communicator meetings) so that parallel projects could be developed. These are providing access to hands on real natural materials. Education,Other
